pcl:GlyphBlight.NAME: Glyph of the Fool
DESCRIPTION: At the start of combat: Activate #b1 of #b3 #yBlights for the combat. Its potency is equal to number of #yActs cleared times this #yGlyph's counter.{0}

pcl:GlyphBlight1.NAME: Glyph of the Magician
DESCRIPTION: Enemies start with #b{0} [Ritual]. Whenever you clear an #yAct: Increases by #b{1} times this #yGlyph's counter.

pcl:GlyphBlight2.NAME: Glyph of the High Priestess
DESCRIPTION: Enemies have +#b{0}% HP. Whenever you clear an #yAct: Increases by +#b{1}% times this #yGlyph's counter.

pcl:UpgradedHand.NAME: Upgraded Hand
DESCRIPTION: Your maximum hand size is increased by #b{0}.
